mapper.select: SELECT A.DATE_YM ,B.HOSP_CD ,FN_GET_DTL_CODE('Z','MFORM_NO',B.MFORM_NO) AS MFORM_NM ,B.CLAIM_NO ,B.BILL_SEQ ,B.PAT_NAME ,B.FIRST_ADMT ,IFNULL(FN_GET_DTL_CODE('Z','SPEC_TYPE',C.SPEC_TYPE),'') AS SPCODE_NM ,B.PAT_ID ,B.FAC_CODE ,CASE WHEN (B.PAY_TYPE = '1' OR B.MED_TYPE = '03') THEN '1.정액' ELSE '2.행위' END AS PAY_TYPE ,CASE WHEN B.CLAIM_GRP = '' THEN '일반' WHEN B.CLAIM_GRP = '1' THEN '보완' WHEN B.CLAIM_GRP = '2' THEN '추가' WHEN B.CLAIM_GRP = '3' THEN '분리' END CLAIM_GRP ,B.JIN_DAYS ,B.ACC_TYPE ,B.MED_TYPE ,B.MED_RESULT ,FORMAT(IFNULL(B.MED_AMT2,0) + IFNULL(B.NON100_AMT,0) + IFNULL(B.VET_AMT,0),0) AS MED_AMT ,FORMAT(IFNULL(B.CLAIM_AMT,0) + IFNULL(B.NON100_CLAIM,0) + IFNULL(B.DISABLED_AMT,0),0) AS CLAIM_AMT ,FORMAT(IFNULL(B.SELF_AMT,0) + IFNULL(B.NON100_CO_PAY,0) + IFNULL(B.VET_CO_PAY,0),0) AS SELF_AMT FROM TBL_CHUNG_MST A JOIN TBL_MYOUNG_MST B ON B.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND B.CLAIM_NO = A.CLAIM_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_SPECODE_MST C ON C.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND C.CLAIM_NO = A.CLAIM_NO AND C.BILL_SEQ = B.BILL_SEQ WHERE B.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND B.CLAIM_NO = A.CLAIM_NO And A.HOSP_CD = #{hospCd} AND A.DATE_YM = #{dateYm} AND A.CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo} ORDER BY A.DATE_YM , A.CLAIM_NO

-- 진단명 WITH DIAG_NAME_CTE AS ( SELECT DIAG_CODE, KOR_DIAG_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DIAG_CODE ORDER BY KOR_DIAG_NAME) AS RN FROM TBL_DISE_CODE WHERE ACTION_YN = 'Y' ) SELECT A.DATE_YM, B.HOSP_CD, C.BILL_SEQ, C.DIAG_CODE, D.KOR_DIAG_NAME AS DIAG_NAME, C.DIAG_TYPE, IFNULL(C.MED_FIELD,'') AS MED_FIELD , IFNULL(C.LICENSE_TYPE,'') AS LICENSE_TYPE , IFNULL(C.LICENSE_NO ,'') AS LICENSE_NO , IFNULL(C.MED_START_DATE,'') AS MED_START_DATE FROM TBL_CHUNG_MST A JOIN TBL_MYOUNG_MST B ON A.HOSP_CD = B.HOSP_CD AND A.CLAIM_NO = B.CLAIM_NO JOIN TBL_DISEASE_MST C ON C.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND C.CLAIM_NO = A.CLAIM_NO AND C.BILL_SEQ = B.BILL_SEQ LEFT JOIN DIAG_NAME_CTE D ON D.DIAG_CODE = C.DIAG_CODE AND D.RN = 1 WHERE A.HOSP_CD = #{hospCd} AND A.DATE_YM = #{dateYm} AND A.CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo} AND B.BILL_SEQ = #{billSeq} ORDER BY C.BILL_SEQ , C.DIAG_TYPE

WITH SUGA_CTE AS ( SELECT FEE_CODE, FEE_TYPE, MAX(START_DT) AS START_DT FROM TBL_SUGA_MST WHERE ACTION_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY FEE_CODE, FEE_TYPE ) SELECT K.DATE_YM, K.HOSP_CD, K.ITEM_NO , K.CODE_NO , K.SUB_CODE_NM , E.KOR_NM AS KOR_NAME, K.BILL_SEQ, K.EDI_CODE, K.CODE_TYPE, K.UNIT_PRICE , K.ONCE_DOSE , K.DAILY_DOSE, K.TOTAL_DOSE, K.AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT B.DATE_YM , A.HOSP_CD , '' AS ITEM_NO , '' AS CODE_NO , FN_GET_DTL_CODE('','','') SUB_CODE_NM , A.BILL_SEQ , A.EDI_CODE , A.CODE_TYPE ,'' UNIT_PRICE , IFNULL(A.ONCE_DOSE,'1') AS ONCE_DOSE , A.DAILY_DOSE , A.TOTAL_DOSE , 0 AMOUNT FROM TBL_JINOUT_MST A JOIN TBL_CHUNG_MST B ON B.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND B.CLAIM_NO = A.CLAIM_NO WHERE A.HOSP_CD = #{hospCd} AND A.CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo} AND A.BILL_SEQ = #{billSeq} AND B.DATE_YM = #{dateYm} UNION ALL SELECT A.DATE_YM, B.HOSP_CD, C.ITEM_NO , C.CODE_NO , FN_GET_DTL_CODE('YD','ITEM_NO',C.ITEM_NO) SUB_CODE_NM , C.BILL_SEQ, C.EDI_CODE, C.CODE_TYPE, FORMAT(C.UNIT_PRICE,0) AS UNIT_PRICE , IFNULL(C.ONCE_DOSE,'1') AS ONCE_DOSE , C.DAILY_DOSE, C.TOTAL_DOSE, FORMAT(C.AMOUNT,0) AMOUNT FROM TBL_CHUNG_MST A JOIN TBL_MYOUNG_MST B ON A.HOSP_CD = B.HOSP_CD AND A.CLAIM_NO = B.CLAIM_NO JOIN TBL_JINORD_MST C ON C.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND C.CLAIM_NO = B.CLAIM_NO AND C.BILL_SEQ = B.BILL_SEQ -- 개선된 JOIN WHERE A.HOSP_CD = #{hospCd} AND A.DATE_YM = #{dateYm} AND A.CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo} AND B.BILL_SEQ = #{billSeq} )K LEFT JOIN SUGA_CTE D ON D.FEE_CODE = K.EDI_CODE AND D.FEE_TYPE = CASE WHEN K.CODE_TYPE IN ('1', 'A') THEN '1' WHEN K.CODE_TYPE IN ('3') THEN '2' ELSE '3' END LEFT JOIN TBL_SUGA_MST E ON E.FEE_CODE = D.FEE_CODE AND E.FEE_TYPE = D.FEE_TYPE AND E.START_DT = D.START_DT AND E.ACTION_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY K.ITEM_NO ,K.CODE_NO

SELECT B.ITEM_NO , B.CODE_NO ,B.CODE_NAME, B.GASAN_RATE , FORMAT(SUM(B.JEA_AMT),0) AS JEA_AMT , FORMAT(SUM(B.HWI_AMT),0) AS HWI_AMT , FORMAT(SUM(B.GASAN_AMT),0) AS GASAN_AMT FROM ( SELECT A.ITEM_NO , A.CODE_NO , CASE WHEN F.MFORM_NO IN('M312','M322') THEN -- 산재(한방) FN_GET_DTL_CODE('H', 'CODE_NO', CONCAT(TRIM(A.ITEM_NO), A.CODE_NO)) WHEN F.MFORM_NO IN('K020','K021','K030','K031') THEN -- 건보(한방) FN_GET_DTL_CODE('H', 'CODE_NO', CONCAT(TRIM(A.ITEM_NO), A.CODE_NO)) WHEN F.MFORM_NO IN('C110','C111') THEN -- 자보(한방) FN_GET_DTL_CODE('H', 'CODE_NO', CONCAT(TRIM(A.ITEM_NO), A.CODE_NO)) ELSE FN_GET_DTL_CODE('Y', 'CODE_NO', CONCAT(TRIM(A.ITEM_NO), A.CODE_NO)) END AS CODE_NAME, CASE WHEN E.HOS_GRD = '1' THEN IFNULL(D.PROP_1,0) WHEN E.HOS_GRD = '2' THEN IFNULL(D.PROP_2,0) WHEN E.HOS_GRD = '3' THEN IFNULL(D.PROP_3,0) END GASAN_RATE, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN C.FEE_CODE IS NULL THEN A.AMOUNT END), 0) AS JEA_AMT, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (A.CODE_TYPE IN ('1','A') AND C.FEE_CODE IS NOT NULL) THEN A.AMOUNT END), 0) AS HWI_AMT, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN (A.CODE_TYPE IN ('1','A') AND C.FEE_CODE IS NOT NULL) THEN A.AMOUNT * ( CASE WHEN E.HOS_GRD = '1' THEN IFNULL(D.PROP_1, 0) / 100 WHEN E.HOS_GRD = '2' THEN IFNULL(D.PROP_2, 0) / 100 WHEN E.HOS_GRD = '3' THEN IFNULL(D.PROP_3, 0) / 100 ELSE IFNULL(D.PROP_3, 0) / 100 END ) ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS GASAN_AMT FROM WNN.TBL_JINORD_MST A JOIN WNN.TBL_CHUNG_MST B ON B.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND B.CLAIM_NO = A.CLAIM_NO AND B.DATE_YM = #{dateYm} LEFT JOIN (SELECT FEE_CODE, MAX(START_DT) AS MAX_START_DT FROM WNN.TBL_SUGA_MST WHERE FEE_TYPE = '1' AND DIV_TYPE = '2' GROUP BY FEE_CODE ) C ON C.FEE_CODE = A.EDI_CODE AND C.MAX_START_DT <= CONCAT(B.DATE_YM, '01') LEFT JOIN WNN.TBL_CODE_DTL D ON D.CODE_GB = 'Z' AND D.ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND D.CODE_CD = 'CFORM_NO' AND D.SUB_CODE = B.CFORM_NO LEFT JOIN WNN.TBL_HOSP_MST E ON E.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND E.ACTION_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TBL_MYOUNG_MST F ON F.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND F.CLAIM_NO = A.CLAIM_NO AND F.BILL_SEQ = A.BILL_SEQ WHERE ((A.ITEM_NO = 'L' AND A.CODE_NO = '01') OR (A.ITEM_NO <> 'L')) AND A.HOSP_CD = #{hospCd} AND A.CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo} AND A.BILL_SEQ = #{billSeq} GROUP BY A.ITEM_NO , A.CODE_NO ,CODE_NAME ,GASAN_RATE , MFORM_NO ) B GROUP BY B.ITEM_NO , B.CODE_NO , B.CODE_NAME , B.GASAN_RATE ORDER BY B.ITEM_NO , B.CODE_NO

SELECT A.DATE_YM, B.HOSP_CD, A.CLAIM_NO, C.BILL_SEQ, C.UNIT_TYPE , C.SPEC_TYPE , C.SPEC_DETAIL FROM TBL_CHUNG_MST A JOIN TBL_MYOUNG_MST B ON B.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND B.CLAIM_NO = A.CLAIM_NO JOIN TBL_SPECODE_MST C ON C.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND C.CLAIM_NO = B.CLAIM_NO AND C.BILL_SEQ = B.BILL_SEQ WHERE A.HOSP_CD = #{hospCd} AND A.DATE_YM = #{dateYm} AND A.CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo} AND B.BILL_SEQ = #{billSeq}
